message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a fair offer to you, considering its value to you is $1200000. I'll sell it to you for $1200000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long I can hold onto it, so I hope you'll take advantage of this chance to acquire it at a great price.
